name: The Ghost Detective (2022 Team 6)
description:
Ghost Detective ( 2022 Team 6)

Story:

The game title is Ghost Detective and it is a room escaping game. You will play a legendary detective named Chloe, in an airtight house to solve a mysterious murder. Chloe rose to fame in the police world thanks to her secret superpower, the ability to see and talk to ghosts. But this time when she stepped into the house, she lost consciousness..... When she wakes up again, she finds herself in a locked and sealed bathroom...Since you are detective Chloe, you want to collect helpful items to escape from not only the bathroom but also this mysterious house, talk to the ghosts to gather useful information to piece together the truth of the murder, and make the final decision after escaping to end the game. Hence, to have conversations with NPCs to receive hints to game puzzles, and solve the puzzles to collect certain items, then with the specific game items to unlock hidden plots. 

Game Plot:

A rich old couple has two children, the elder son Thomson and the younger daughter Sasha. Thomson is an insatiable and untold gambler who has always coveted the old man's property. Finally, one day he made a careful, thoughtful, however, evil plan and made up his mind firmly to kill his parents and sister so as to inherit the inheritance as soon as possible. However, after he murdered his parents, his youngest daughter Sasha secretly escaped. At the same time, Thomson also found that the famous detective Chloe was his father's illegitimate daughter while reading his father's will and testament. This shocking discovery made him extremely flustered, and at the same time, a more evil and bolder idea came into his mind. He called the police station and asked legendary detective Chloe to investigate his parents' murders, and quietly set a trap to kill his sister together and become the only legal heir……Will ghost detective Chloe find out the real murderer? Will she find the missing younger sister? Finally, will she find out who she is? And the most important part, what decision will she make after going through all these? 

Instructions:

  • Use W, A, S, and D to move.
  • Left Click to start and proceed with conversations.
  • Click F to pick up items and put them in the inventory system.
  • Click Tab to see the inventory collected. 
  • Read conversations carefully to receive hints which lead to puzzles. 
  • Carry correct items to trigger certain conversations or open the doors.
